meanings.definition: Akes (verb): to cause pain or distress
meanings.sent1: The loud noise akes my ears.
meanings.sent2: Seeing her cry akes me sad.
meanings.sent3: The spicy food akes my tongue dance.
meanings.sent4: The harsh words akes his heart ache.
meanings.sent5: The sharp thorn akes my finger throb.

meanings.definition: Akes (noun): a feeling of physical or emotional discomfort
meanings.sent1: His akes were evident in his frown.
meanings.sent2: She tried to hide her akes with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The uncomfortable chair akes my back.
meanings.sent4: The akes of loneliness weigh heavy on him.
meanings.sent5: The akes of rejection linger in her mind.
